hero.title: About MEB CBC Rwanda
hero.subtitle: Empowering communities through film and training

story.title: Who We Are
story.content:
MEB CBC is a **Rwanda-based film production social enterprise** localized in 2021. We bridge professional filmmaking with social impact, creating a sustainable model that benefits both our clients and our community.

We produce high-quality professional films for commercial clients, NGOs, and international productions, while simultaneously operating as a social enterprise that reinvests **100% of our profits** into non-profit training programs for youth and women in Rwanda.

Our dual mission allows us to maintain professional excellence in film production while making a lasting impact on Rwanda's creative industry and the lives of aspiring filmmakers and animators.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To produce world-class films and provide professional fixing services while creating sustainable opportunities for Rwandan youth and women through comprehensive training and job creation in the film and animation industry.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be East Africa's leading social enterprise in film production, recognized for both our creative excellence and our transformative impact on communities through media education and empowerment.

differentiators.title: Professional Excellence
differentiators.description: We deliver the same high-quality production and fixing services as any commercial film company, with experienced crews and international standards.

differentiators.title: Social Impact
differentiators.description: Every project you do with us directly funds training programs for underprivileged youth and women, creating lasting change in communities.

differentiators.title: Local Expertise
differentiators.description: As a locally-rooted organization, we bring authentic cultural understanding and deep community connections to every project.

differentiators.title: Sustainable Model
differentiators.description: Our social enterprise model ensures long-term sustainability for both our business operations and our training programs.

differentiators.title: Partnership Approach
differentiators.description: We collaborate closely with international partners like Media Education Babelsberg to bring world-class training to Rwanda.

differentiators.title: Proven Track Record
differentiators.description: Hundreds of creatives trained, multiple successful productions, and measurable impact on Rwanda's media landscape.
